newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: KL blue chips close up on futures buying.
newsitem.headline: KL blue chips close up on futures buying.

text.p: Kuala Lumpur blue-chip stocks moved up sharply at the close of the market on futures-led buying, after a relatively lacklustre day, dealers and analysts said.
The blue-chip Composite Index closed up 7.57 to 1168.31, while the all-share EMAS index ended just 1.23 points higher at 335.94. The Second Board index was up 2.23 points to 636.59.

Tenaga closed up 30 cents to 10.10 ringgit. "Tenaga closing the way it did dragged the (Composite) index up towards the end of the day," said an institutional dealer at a European broking house in Singapore.
